message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $12000.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $16000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I would like to counter with a price of $14000.
I'm glad we're getting closer, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $17000, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again.
I understand your position, but I would like to propose a price of $15000.
